        public void close()

        public void rollback()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionalContext
        Close and rollback transaction context. For cases when exception occurred during query execution and owning transaction should be rolledback
        Specified by:

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionalContext
        This is used to terminate a currently running query. Can be called from any thread. Will roll back the current transaction if it is still open.
        Specified by:
        terminate in interface TransactionalContext
